attributes.additional_details: @Walken4GOP has repeatedly used racist and abusive language on social networking site Twitter, regarding football/soccer player Fabrice Muamba, who had collapsed during a match and was rushed to hospital. @Walken4GOP has constantly called Fabrice Muamba a ni**er, and has also tweeted " Just one less criminal... Let him die and let it be." regarding the colour of Fabrice Muamba's skin, he has also tweeted "One less jiggaboo if you ask me." He has tweeted out many more offensive tweets, some much too offensive to display on here. His abusive tweets have also targeted the UK and The Royal Family. Please get this monstrosity off Twitter please.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Twitter administrators.
